Name: The Lost Valley
About the game: Game story: Your plane was destroyed by lightning near an unknown continent. You're the only survivor on the plane. After some exploration, we found that there are many enemies hidden here. Look for guns and kill the enemy! Get out of this forest! Content and games -Players operate characters to fight with enemies -All kinds of guns -Explore the vast map Features of the game: -The first person is a really exciting way to play. -Players need to collect the enemy's guns to deal with the enemy. -Please pay attention to the enemy. They are hiding in a secret place Game control mode: A-right S-back W-forward D-right F-pick up guns Left click - shoot!
Meta Title: The Lost Valley: Mar 1, 2021, DD GAME and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on The Lost Valley? Check out the release date (Mar 1, 2021), developer insights from DD GAME, and a complete game summary.
